name: ボンバーマン'93
summary: Bomberman '93 (ボンバーマン'93 Bonbāman Nintī Surī) is a video game in the Bomberman series. It was released on the PC Engine on December 11, 1992 in Japan, with western TurboGrafx-16 releases following in 1993. The game has been re-released for the Wii's Virtual Console, with full multiplayer capability intact, in North America, Europe and Australia. Bomberman '93 later spawned a sequel titled Bomberman '94.
